website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, comfortable, durable, and affordable are only some of the qualities that are used to describe the Skechers Stamina - Nuovo.Despite not carrying complicated technologies compared to its contemporary brands, these sneakers possess favourable characteristics that make its users satisfied. Moreover, those with foot conditions can attest that these sneakers can provide relief to the feet.
pros: Several reviewers who were suffering from foot conditions like rollover ankles, plantar fasciitis, diabetes, arthritis, and chronic heel pain, felt relief from wearing the Skechers Stamina - Nuovo
Some of the testers appreciate that these sneakers do not include a memory foam midsole
Despite this, the shoe possesses an excellent cushion feel
Majority of the testers dropped positive reviews on these sneakers’ comfort as it can be worn all day with minimum fatigue
A few noted that there is no breaking in required for these shoes
Because the shoe is designed to be wide at the bottom, it provides a stable platform which contributes to its all-day comfort
A handful of wearers highly appreciate the style of these sneakers
One noted that the combination of the colors adds character
More so, its versatile style makes it a suitable pair to wear on almost any occasion
One tester gave high regards on these sneakers as it held up during hiking and backpacking
The Stamina - Nuovo offers better arch support and motion control compared to the higher-end name-brand running shoes, claimed by one consumer
These sneakers outlast most of the other sneaker brands in the market, according to an online reviewer
The traction of these shoes are outstanding, said one commenter
Several consumers are highly satisfied with their purchase given that these sneakers are comfortable, stylish, and inexpensive
cons: Although these are comfortable already, a few users hope that the Shape-ups are incorporated on these shoes
Upon opening the box, it emitted an odd smell that threw the purchaser off
The inner liner of the Stamina - Nuovo wore out already after three to four months of use
A couple of buyers find the white laces too striking and wish that another set of laces come with these shoes so that users can have a more subdued option
These produce a sound on every step which can be annoying, according to one purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, confusing product description - features vary by color.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same product in two different colors. To my surprise, one color included a memory-foam insole and the other color did not. A visit to the manufacturer's web site revealed the following. The product description "Skechers Sport Men's Stamina Nuovo Cutback Lace-Up Sneaker" is incorrect. Skechers has two models: Stamina - Nuovo (50988) and Stamina - Cutback (51286). The Cutback (51286) is about $10 more and features a memory-foam insole. The Nuovo (50988) does NOT feature a memory-foam insole. One last comment. The "navy" is more like gray with just a hint of blue. Unless you saw my navy and gray side by side, you would think that the navy was really gray.
customer_reviews.author: John Schueler

customer_reviews.title: Built like brick s#!t house
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today, and I'll update in a few months if they fall apart, but out of the box these things are awesome! These shoes are built like brick s#!t houses! Sturdy stitching in all the right places. The tread seems like it is pretty solid as well. I'm hoping these last a while. I plan to use these for my daily 4.5 mile runs, so time will tell. The memory foam out of the package is like walking on a cloud though! Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, well built, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these almost every day for more than a year. I only have this pair of shoes so I use these for walking, go to college, go out, for everything. These are the most durable shoes I ever used. Very confortable, the size I bought fit a bit large, but it's ok. Will I buy more shoes of this brand? Of course! The pictures shows how my sneakers looks after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Larez

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are pretty comfy, but they are just a little narrower than I thought. Not bad or to the point they're uncomfortable though. I've only worn them a few times so could need more breaking in. I do like the memory foam. Feel like I am walking on a cloud. I've worn Brook's sneakers for a few years now and they are by far the most comfortable shoes I've worn,but the adrenaline series shoes are $130ish. For the price these shoes are great. Hoping once I wear them a few times they break I a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam has no cushioning for impacts!
customer_reviews.text: No problem with the seller... shoes were delivered on time and in good shape. However, these are the worst shoes that I have owned in years. I do not understand this memory foam insert craze that all manufacturers are pushing. If you think about it, memory foam has very little bounce back, and almost no cushioning after the initial compression. My legs hurt from the bottom of my feet to above my knees. Somehow, the construction, or tread, or both, must have affected the way I walk and caused strain to the interior meniscus on both of my knees, occasionally causing severe pain.
customer_reviews.author: DHenger

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT!! SUPER COMFORTABLE!!! OUTSTANDING PRICE FROM AMAZON!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a really bad back so usually I have to spend about $100 at least on a pair of shoes. These are my first Skechers and they are super comfortable and I will be buying them again also from Amazon. They are also true to size. I can't believe how good the sole is for the amount of money you pay for these and not only that they look extremely good.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Fit was fine, but quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of the exact same sneaker I have owned. I like to have and outdoor pair and a separate indoor pair for exercise. The first two pairs were soooo comfortable. Everything was soft but supportive. I never wanted to take them off. This most recent pair feels like walking in cardboard and plastic. One of the previous pairs had been bought online, so I was confident doing so again. This has made me wary of buying sneakers online going forward. Would not have purchased these if I had felt them in store.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: ... order a pair of sketches and I'm a bit disappointed my shoes are dirty like somebody walk on durt ...
customer_reviews.text: I order a pair of sketches and I'm a bit disappointed my shoes are dirty like somebody walk on durt and they clean te sole but I can still see durt on it and the box Is damaged and broken down like it was kicked around on the floor, so only 3 stars because I'm not the concern over the integrity of the shoes but they really should watch the products they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May not be able to handle big and tall.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a few weeks, replacing a memory foam version. Having the same problem though, feet start to hurt and the cushion compresses until it feels like walking on concrete. Yes, I'm 6'2" and 220 but a shoe sized as a 14 should be designedc to handle the load. This is the third sketcher and it's gotten worse. Bare foot and slides (flip flops) my feet are fine and get better. Its a shame as the rest feels good and looks good as well. Just doesnt support big guys. Going to a different shoe and We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: PaulHolm

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and a great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm always nervous about buying clothing online. It never fits like it's supposed to. When I first tried them on it appeared they would be tight which was weird because I purchased the extra wide pair. After walking around in them however, they fit like a dream. It's my first pair with memory foam insoles so I guess it took a minute for my feet to sink in. Having been wearing them around for a couple weeks, they're still great! Anyway, comfortable and a great price! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for anyone who is on their feet all day
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable walking shoes I've ever owned. I'm a construction superintendent on college campuses, which means I do a lot of walking, like 14,000-20,000 steps per day. These memory foam Sketchers shoes are the most comfortable I've ever used. It feels like walking on a cloud, and every pair fits me just right. I've bought probably 5 pairs of these shoes by now. They last me about a year with daily use. After 10-12 months the some seams start coming apart and the memory foam gets "compacted" to where its not as soft anymore, so I just buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: P. BrudererTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have odd shaped feet and it is hard to find a standard shoe that fits perfect. These are very comfortable everywhere except they are slightly narrow and rub the sides of my feet where they transition to the toe. The same size in a wide is too wide. I can't fault the manufacturer as this is a common problem I have with all shoes. Overall I am very pleased with the quality and comfort. So far I have worn them for working out at the gym and walking over 20 miles and they show no sings of any manufacturing flaws or any premature wear.
customer_reviews.author: MikeBoyle

customer_reviews.title: Made in China? with inaccurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sneaker because of the rave reviews and thought that maybe the negative reviewers were being picky. Ha! These negative reviewers were right. The width was matked with a W without E values like E, EE, etc. The sizing seemed to be from China, as the width was off and the writing seemed to be in Chinese. Furthermore, the heel area was loose. The width should have been concentated above the arch area. And if this was not enough, these sneakers were heavy and clunky like Herman Munster shoes. Needless to say, these sneakers got returned.. I am left wondering if these were Chinese knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: S. LaCharite (real name)

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Very easy to select and reorder these!
customer_reviews.text: I like these sneakers a lot. They seem to be of good quality and are still light in weight. This is a repeat order because I am able to get my size and the wide width that is hard to find in stores. They are comfortable and I don’t seem to get the sweaty foot felling, they are well ventilated shoe. I find the price to be very good. I will definitely buy these again and it’s so easy that Amazon has my size and color information from my orders so I can just go to buy again and reorder them, no searching store to store.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Arlaud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support for those on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my feet all day working in healthcare and have very bad feet. Had flat foot surgery last year and am due for an ankle replacement down the road. These are fantastic- a supportive athletic shoe with the memory foam. I wear a woman’s 10/11 wide. When I buy a men’s shoe, I usually get a 9 wide. I also wear orthotics so I got a 10 wide, as the memory foam inserts aren’t removable. Wanted to make sure I had room to move my toes! One size up and the toe box is perfect. Can’t say enough good things about these shoes. I own two pair and will be buying another pair or two.
customer_reviews.author: MABP

customer_reviews.title: Not a typical Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Skechers for the past 2 years. They are the only shoe that when I get home from work after being on my feet for 9+ hours that make my feet still feel good. For some reason, these just aren't the same as all the others. They have the same soft insides, but by the time I've had them on for 4 or 5 hours, the only thing I want to do is take them off. I didn't wear them right away after buying them so I can't return them so I'm just using them for shorter walks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kremer

customer_reviews.title: These are by far my favorite non hiking boot shoes to wear
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite non hiking boot shoes to wear. They breath well and fit perfectly. Pros: Look nice Last a long time for me. Feel comfortable all day and in many different uses. (I use them for work , working out, and sometimes smaller hikes.) Do not cause gout attacks Do not have memory foam cushions Cons: None Overall my favorite shoes. I highly recommend them as I think everyone will enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stanhouse

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers is My Go To
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many other shoe manufactures and only two fit with comfort and size. Sketchers every time hit the mark. When I order a size 10 that's what I get. I do a lot of walking for my exercise and will go through other brands in 6-8 months. Sketchers I purchase one per year. The old pair gets retired to lawn shoes. I purchased Sketchers slip-on shoes for my house-shoes, they're not to hot or cold. If you've not tried Sketchers Brand shoes give them a try. I don't think you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Don M. Mcnulty

customer_reviews.title: From the first time I put them on they were comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I do things wearing mine that probably would be better done with work boots but they are so comfortable that I tend to grab them first. I ordered a second pair for when I've cleaned up and am going somewhere. My work pair gets subjected to the abuse of welding, grinding, scuffing around on concrete, spashed with paint and primer and who knows what all else. As I wear one pair out I will order another as long as they keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyMac

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear to work. Something weird inside framework of sole caused my foot to fall asleep. (Pressure on a specific part of the bottom of my foot) I don't think you should be able to feel the structure of the shoe when you walk! I added an insert for arch support and problem got worse. The shoe has no real structure. My feet feel better barefoot. Switched back to New Balance. Decided to rename Sketchers "Sketchies". Can't even wear them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for walking and for heavier weight folks like me
customer_reviews.text: I like the width and style. I would give it a 5 Star if not for the following reason. ONE THING I DON'T LIKE IS THAT I WANT TO BUY THE SAME SHOE IN A DIFFERENT COLOR SCHEME AND THE MATERIALS ARE THE SAME, """"BUT THE SHOE "NAVY BLUE/ GREY" IS WAY OVER PRICED.!!!!! its the same shoe! Just a different color scheme. what is going on? the color can't be the reason to raise the price by $20. This turns me away from skecthers, a company if have been purchasing from for years...
customer_reviews.author: T. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart quick.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the reviews of people saying that their pairs have lasted years, but that's not been my experience. Mine fell apart in the span of 2 months. To me, that's really not acceptable for this kind of price point. A $10 shoe from Walmart? Sure. A known brand like Skechers? I expected more. I'm sick of these shoe companies cutting quality but charging the same prices for something that might as well be sold in a 10 pack.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of shoes ... for three months.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great pair of shoes...for three months of walking. My wife and I walk most mornings (age-appropriate exercise :) ) at a good pace, no running or high impact. In any event, the heel pad has completely worn through after three months, exposing the (surprisingly sharp) plastic support within (as other reviewers have also noted). Perhaps I shouldn't expect more for a 35-dollar pair of sneakers, but I do.
customer_reviews.author: David deSilva

customer_reviews.title: hot & narrow
customer_reviews.text: hard to tell the details of a sneaker when buying online. the fabric is not very breathable, but I guess this means that it' ll be more durable? I have narrow feet, so the width is perfect. however, I have big toe bunions, so this is a pressure point. I'm getting some irritation there for now - maybe they'll break in 2020.09.11 - 1-month update: they seem to be breaking in very well! now that it's cooler out, they are comfy
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: XW is comparable to a 4E (slightly larger in the toebox than a new balance). This sneaker is actually larger all around compared to other brands. The insoles have a dense memory foam composition to them. you have a spring in your step, and it feels like you're walking on heaven for like 4-5 hrs. Problem is memory foam isn't very resilient..so it eventually compresses and it feels like you're walking barefoot. It's absolutely essential you purchase good insoles separate from these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: I_MOVE_STUFF

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable, and affordable --this shoe has it all...
customer_reviews.text: (The ONLY reason I took one star off is because my son wears a Size 13 shoe, but we are always forced to find a size 14 in Skechers, due to a glaring size differentiation. This is also the way I have to buy MY Skechers, as a female, so it's definitely "brand-wide"). All of that being said, these are an EXCELLENT pair of shoes. My son wore them to work immediately after receiving them, and he loves them. They are stylish, comfortable, and we got a very good price on Amazon. Highly recommended, regardless of the sizing thing...
customer_reviews.author: Lynda C.K.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Shoes That Fit Me As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Have only had these shoes for a month, so I don't have an opinion as to durability, but can say they look good and fit as expected. What I especially like is that I can slip on and off these shoes if I'm too lazy to untie them, and the shoe tongues don't move down my feet as I slide them in. My only suggestion to the manufacturer is that I think it would be better to have a gray base instead of a white base in order to match the color of the shoes, and to minimize the look of any dirt or dust on them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and comfort. I ordered a medium width and size 13 (my foot size is about 12 1/2 and I have a narrow heel and someway wider width around ball of my foot). I added a pair of double inner soles for extra comfort. This sneaker doesn’t have the newer Sketches memory foam. But adding a $1.99 pair of Target or Walmart inner soles works great. I paid about $36.00 and got a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Capuano, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: My go to Sports shoe for work and tooling around - I probably buy 4 pairs a year
customer_reviews.text: My go to Sports shoe for work and tooling around - I probably buy 4 pairs a year and I'm on my 15th pair, I clean them with dish soap and a tooth brush and I order a new pair of shoe laces for each pair I buy. I have a clean pair to tool around in until they get a little worn then I work in them until I can't clean them. Great Value, know your foot size for proper fit - Can't go wrong with these
customer_reviews.author: P. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Stiff top but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are well made and have comfortable shape, but like some Sketchers, they have one problem - very stiff top. If you mostly sit or even stand on one spot it probably wouldn't be a big issue, but I have to walk around 10000 steps daily on my job, and these shoes just wouldn't be comfortable because their top doesn't comfortably bend with foot. I liked Sketchers Afterburn Strike model much better, it has a bit less appealing design but much more flexible upper and more breathable.
customer_reviews.author: V.S.Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, they are snug but I just put them on w beak in time they will be perfect, they came packed very carefully, I never purchased sketchers before these and I’m impressed, I definitely will be purchasing sketchers again , very well made😎 up date I wore them in house and they started to hurt my small toe both sides , unfortunately amazon did not have it in wide , I had to re turn this 🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Happy

customer_reviews.title: Not the most stylish sneaker available
customer_reviews.text: Good sneaker for its purpose. Soft cushioning; thick bottoms. Toe box looks a bit wide and therefore it looses some of the "styling". Nevertheless, thus far sneaker does a good job; easy walking (I don't run). I personally didn't like the pure white laces so I purchased a pair that went much better together with the shoe coloring. Good price. All-in-all, a good sneaker and a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A J Saveriano

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Sending Out WIde as Extra Wide
customer_reviews.text: These shoes would have been perfect for me. I have a very flat foot so I need an extra-wide shoe. Unfortunately none of the shoes I really like make extra-wide but Sketchers does. I ordered and sent back 2 pairs of these shoes because Amazon sent out Wide instead of extra-wide. Even the sticker on the box said they were wide. I have no idea whom to contact but maybe someone from Amazon will see this and correct the problem. Returns were a breeze as normal and customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Clemfan1981

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit - Perfect Comfortable Casual Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't purchased a pair of Skechers Sneakers in years and have had this pair in my Wish List for ages. I was very pleased that the fit surpassed my expectations! Comfort, support and simple style: 3 outta 3! It's getting harder to find certain styles in an actual Skechers retail store and many store fronts are being downsized. Satisfied to know I can find the right fit online - Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Schirle

customer_reviews.title: First and Last Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable. The sole is hard as a rock. The heel area is WAY too loose. These Skechers were/are my first and last. They almost seem like extremely cheap shoes and sell only due to relentless marketing. Thought they would be comfortable walking shoes. Nope. They 'Look" good, but that's all I can say. I'll stick with New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRon

customer_reviews.title: Only one flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and overall they seem well-made, except for one thing. The tongue on the left shoe is for some reason about 1.5 inches shorter than the tongue on the right shoe. It's so short it actually doesn't quite reach up under the top lace crossover, making the left shoe a little less comfortable. Hopefully this is just an issue with my pair, and overall, I'm still happy with the purchase, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tactful

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, not the greatest in look for my taste, but I knew that going in.
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough one...the shoe is decent, looks ok, but not stellar, and is durable enough...but it isn't exactly a standout in any of those areas. For me, I have a regular width foot but a narrow heel and a bit taller arch. These shoes are one of the few that fit my foot but allow good cushion for my small heel. As they are not standouts in looks, I really only wear them for work. The price, when it is down in the mid-$30's makes them a good value. Too much higher in price and they are "meh", at best.
customer_reviews.author: The Websters

customer_reviews.title: I believe these will be a good shoe for many months to come
customer_reviews.text: I just got them today but I think they're going to be a good sneaker for me. They seem very solid compared to the shoes I've been buying over the years. The fit is a little goofy maybe a little bit too big maybe a little bit too tight but they're sturdy and I feel comfortable wearing them and that's why I had such a disjointed review here. Overall, I am happy with my purchase here
customer_reviews.author: Jake Snow

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color that I bought. They made ch the white and dark camo shorts I own. I bought a size bigger because the last pair was snug. They didn’t offer mediums or wide shoes. These size thirteen are a bit snug on the sides of the widest part of my foot. I will not be wearing them to work out now. I will have to just sport them when I go to the store or see a movie.
customer_reviews.author: John Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old has big and wide feet. I always have trouble finding wide shoes to fit. He probably could have gotten away with a size 8 but ordered 8.5 wide. They are a little long, but they do not slip up and down. He says they fit well and feel really comfortable. I am glad, because I didn't want to pay return shipping. Happy kid...Happy Mom.
customer_reviews.author: mamma2boys

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice walking shoe Love the color combo ... I am now addicted to Skechers Have several pair .. good quality and build .... first running shoe from them Enticed by price point ..... good value at this price point .. not more No issues so far as experienced by other reviews I ware them occasionally .. should last a while
customer_reviews.author: REC III

customer_reviews.title: Great looking casual sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been very enjoyable and are wearing well. I only use them for casual outings, not sports. They look and fit well. My only complaint is that the threads in the toepiece tend to start fraying. I don't know if they are just for show or actually hold the toepiece. Wish they'd do that differently. Still a nice shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Width is perfect for my orthotics!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wide shoe and tried a couple, but this particular shoe's width (x-wide) fits perfectly. I have to wear custom orthotics and these are the only shoes I have found that they fit perfectly. They look like I have clown feet, but whatever it takes to be comfortable. I hope they last longer than my last Skechers which was only a year.
customer_reviews.author: shannon koenigstein

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever especially for lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: About 12 years ago my back was killing me and I ended up having lower back surgery. I bought my first pair of these at Kohl's originally and it is like walking on a cloud with the thick soles. I do not like the ones with the memory foam so you have to be really careful when you order these to make sure you don't get the memory foam because the memory foam collapses on me and makes my foot sloshed around in the shoe but these are great
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Albers

customer_reviews.title: I tell a lot of people with feet problem about this shoe and they all seem very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have bone spurs and wear orthotics in my shoes. But for years wearing these certain shoes I don't use my orthotics ever. Don't get me wrong, I've tried other Sketcher Shoes. And I've always regretted not finding out were to buy the Nuovo. In my town they do not have a supply of this shoe , so I buy them here on Amazon. So Amazon, if know this shoe style is going to be discontinued you have to let me know so I can buy 20 pair. I AM NOT JOKING!!! I tell a lot of people with feet problem about this shoe and they all seem very happy with it. And this is Janine's Husband, Scott
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, but not good for people with plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: Not able to replace the insoles and I would not recommend them as a work shoe for people who have issues with plantar fasciitis. My foot started having issues when wearing them at work for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brady

customer_reviews.title: These are the best pair to date
customer_reviews.text: I have recently tried 4 different pair of walking shoes. Size and quality differs a lot between brands and paying more does not make a difference. These are the best pair to date. They are firm but very cushioned in the heels. They fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable. I will replace these in time with the very same shoe. I couldn't;t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: gaelic1

customer_reviews.title: These are my 3rd most comfortable shoes I
customer_reviews.text: These are my 3rd most comfortable shoes I. have. ever. worn! (the other two are also Skechers with memory foam). I have extremely sensitive heels and arches and these shoes are a godsend. The entire sole of the shoe is more classic so you can do rougher activities in them, but it is still so soft and supportive on the inside.The arch support is good, and I am able to do everything in the shoes that I did in my last (walking, running, bicycling). I wish more shoe manufacturers made shoes like these, but as I'm a long time Skechers customer I plan to stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: Merrell

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for me
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy from a brick and mortar store because I like to try on to see what size and what brand of shoe fits the best. I know the quality of sketchers so I thought I would give it a try to buy online. I was quite impressed. The shoes fit very well. they are very comfortable and they look good. I will consider buying more shoes online.
customer_reviews.author: Easydusit57

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I walk between 5 and 6 miles a day and these sneakers fit the bill. I did have a minor issue with my heal (chafing and needs to be bandaged) while waking in these but I think its just a break in situation since this happens to me every time I start wearing a new sneaker until they are broken in . I've been wearing them now for a week and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Expect memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the mandatory memory foam kick that Sketchers has gotten into. I got a pair of shoes similar to these with out memory foam in 2015 and loved them so much I wore them into dust. I ordered these thinking that I could get some more with out the memory foam. 2 disappointing returns later I just decided to tough it out. Now the memory foam insert is constantly slipping around and the tongue always seems to slip under the laces and make it very uncomfortable to walk around. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Box damaged but shoes alright
customer_reviews.text: They fit well & are comfortable. Haven't had them long enough to mention durability or longevity. The box they came in, besides the Amazon box, was damaged but the shoes were not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of these. Each pair I can get up to 4 years use wearing them all day. And I'm on my feet for most of the day. They also hold up really well to a bath wash and open air drying. The laces are the best on the market since I never have to change them, even after 4 years. Comfort and quality is exceptional for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JKG

customer_reviews.title: Firm sole, light on padding
customer_reviews.text: There's a piece of plastic or something acting as support on the right shoe that is poking into my foot. It's like the padding in that area is thin and i can feel the structure rubbing on the ball of my foot. I put a sticky patch in there and I don't notice it as much, but it's still an issue. As to the fit, it's fine. I have a wide foot and it has plenty of room. It's a bit longer length wise than a Nik3 shoe of the same size. The sole of the shoe is very firm. Not near as much padding as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by sketchers shoes. I have never worn then in my like always wore nike but the price was right for everyday beaters. The shoes first impression is comfort they are really soft on the foot the sole in not hard rubber its softer so it has some give back making the walking or standing for longer times more pleasurable.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: For those with mature taste
customer_reviews.text: I love my Sketchers. My kids hate them. So much that they hide them if we’re going somewhere. They say they’re old man shoes. I say they’re wrong. Viva la sketchers!
customer_reviews.author: D.K. Brantley

customer_reviews.title: so far its good
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these instead of the el-cheapo walmart asics or newbalance shoes, the soles on those shoes was mostly foam with a little bit of rubber glued on, and would only last me a couple of months till they were nearly smooth bottomed and thin, these have already surpassed that time frame, and show no signs of fatigue
customer_reviews.author: CFMUSTANG

customer_reviews.title: Short tongue
customer_reviews.text: The tongue is too short to use the last holes. It felt too loose using only the fabric eyes and better when I use the last holes but the tongue keeps moving a fraction of an inch, may be 1/4 inch, and the shoe strings are now on my ankle. I have to keep pulling on the tongue to keep it out. I have never had this before. Most of the pictures of this style show the holes not being used. Some do and you can see how little there is.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: You can find better
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The shoes look good. Cons: These shoes are not comfortable. They run a tad small and are very uncomfortable if you are doing activities that require you to bend your feet (as in kneeling.) If all you plan to do with these shoes is walk or maybe jog, it may fit the bill. I kept them because I thought a few days of use would break them in. Unfortunately they are still as uncomfortable today as when I bought them. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lostcase

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had these rushed so my husband could wear them for our trip to Disney World. He was the only one whose feet didn't hurt! He wears a 10 and it fit perfectly. He was very happy and says they are extremely comfortable. Easy to clean and I recommend them for anyone whos is planning to do a lot of walking!
customer_reviews.author: P.Bergbauer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks good...
customer_reviews.text: Consistent with my experience with all Skechers athletic shoes, this shoe does not disappoint. It's very comfortable and looks really nice as well. The only exception with this Skechers sneaker is it runs just a little on the small side. I usually fit perfectly in a size 10 1/2 Skechers sneaker and I had to exchange this one for an 11, which now fits great. So you might consider moving up 1/2 a size when purchasing. Otherwise, very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: MitchFlys

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wear these 5 days a week at the gym. As a part of my day I’m on the treadmill 45 minutes 6 days a week. Very comfortable shoe and size is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: RodV

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but has some durability issues.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give these shoes a 5 star rating is because of durability issues. I purchased this model last year and about 6 months later the shoe was starting to fall apart at the sole area. I’m on my feet all day at work. So I put these shoes through the test. This is an extremely comfortable shoe. I’m really hoping that this next pair lasts longer than my last pair.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Now I see why these shoes have some many good reviews. So many times I’ve purchase products in the past that had good reviews, only to be disappointed...not this time. My first thought when I put these shoes on for the first time was how comfortable they were. Awesome product and I will buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: MikeM

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes. Im a big guy and go through a lot of shoes as I am on my feet all day. These are great as they have a good sole that absorbs shock. They are also a great value. I get them at the local skechers store....but this was cheaper. I have bought 4 pairs of these in the last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: JOE ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: ... or extra wide feet these shoes will probably be fine. However
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide or extra wide feet these shoes will probably be fine. However, my narrow feet couldn't tolerate wearing this brand. My standard size for over fifty years is 10 & yet with Sketchers my feet were sliding sliding all over. So I switched to this particular model & went down to 9.5 and although better still really hurtful to my feet. My $15 K-Mart sneakers are way more comfortable than this brand. The two Sketcher models I tried are very well built and beautiful so I really wanted to keep them. Discomfort was too much to ignore.........
customer_reviews.author: Jack Engard

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the eighth pair of the Sketcher Nuovo Shoes that I have purchased. It seems that others I have tried don't work for me. I think that it is mostly because of the way they designed the heel. Others like New Balance, Nike etc. leave me with planters faciitis. So either the blue or the grey work for me. Memory foam is not the answer for me, so I am glad they are still making this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Okay. Some unfinished edges.
customer_reviews.text: A bit overly snug out of the box, figure they will give over time. Sole is firm with decent grip on none paved surfaces, okay on dry paved areas. Comfortable, with nice impact absorption and support. Good for walking about or park activities. Some of the stitching is poorly finished, ends are exposed in areas. Some stitches we had to seal as they were just trimmed, not closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Always liked Skechers from my first pair years ago. Out of the box I took a five mile hike to test them. I was not disappointed at all. Great shoe, great price! The shoe platform is very stable and comfy. The memory foam of course is a plus. I highly recommend Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Elson

customer_reviews.title: These Skechers are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent years trying shoe brands looking for comfort and quality that will last more than a few months, and I always come back to Skechers. They may be a bit more expensive than some brands, and wide widths may be harder to find I my size, but they are worth it! I'm not even going to bother looking at other brands anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker. Supportive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a mild form of muscular dystrophy. My legs, feet and hips get fatigued when walking or standing for long periods of time. I wanted a pair of comfortable and supportive sneakers to wear in the house. These sneakers are well made, have great support and are very comfortable. The sneakers are true to size. They aren’t the most fashionable sneakers I own but are great for around the house. I wear them more than my slippers. I am very happy with them and highly recommend these sneakers. Would be a great athletic sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. First pair of Sketchers I have every bought but won't be the last for sure. Surprisingly I even had a guy in the grocery store stop me and ask where I got them. For whatever reason he said they were hard to find these days, presumably in stores, and was looking for a pair. So of course I told him check Amazon, they have plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Swope

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 year old son. He was outgrowing his men's size 9 shoes. I ordered these because the price was good and they had them in wide. They shipped quickly and he has worn then every day. I will probably order these again when he outgrows his current pair.
customer_reviews.author: Egore

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually like clothing online. The sizes vary. But, I couldn’t find anything I liked at a reasonable price locally. These fit just right, standard sizing as I used to expect. They’ve restored my faith in online shoes although I’ll stick with Sketchers only.
customer_reviews.author: aopmike

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable shoe - and sizing is predictable. A little disappointed that after only about a month the two elastic strips on each heel "sprung" and we no longer tight against the back of the shoe. The elastic strips apparently only for look so I ended up cutting them off. The shoes are comfortable which I need since I wear them almost every day all day long.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyPB

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy with the build quality here
customer_reviews.text: These make okay casual shoes, but if you do any amount of walking or work in them they probably won't last long. The seam to the memory foam blew out on one of my heels within the first month, which created a half-inch gap at the back of the shoe. This caused a lot of pain and blisters. Not too happy with the build quality here.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: These shoes put a spring in my step!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this particular shoe for over 10 years, and I think it exceeds other athletic shoes in comfort and durability. I normally wear a 9 wide in women's shoes, but a men's 8 D fits me better in athletic shoes. I was pleasantly surprised to find that a gel pad has been added for additional comfort since the last pair I ordered. Now I can walk in comfort all day long. I hope Amazon will continue to sell this shoe since it is no longer available in the stores where I shop.
customer_reviews.author: Mikasa collector

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoe sent!
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a Skechers Sport Men's Stamina Cutback (51286) Lace-Up Sneaker, but received a Skechers Sport Men's Stamina Nuovo (50988) Lace-Up Sneaker. The Cutback (51286) is about $10 more and features a memory-foam insole. The Nuovo (50988) does NOT feature a memory-foam insole.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, wide shoe that lasts well
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two pair of these exact model because they fit so well and last a sold couple of years before the foam wears out. They are a great daily wear for casual or walking the dog type activities. The wide fit is perfect for my feet and I keep coming back to get another pair like I am right now!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable beyond belief
customer_reviews.text: This is like the 5th pair of this shoe. It is truly the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. I had to get the width right but after that these wear like a dream. The memory foam sole is wonderful but as with memory foam it does wear quickly. Other than that I cannot think of anything else I would change.
customer_reviews.author: JJunk2

customer_reviews.title: Order one size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe but this particular style runs at least one size small in the Length. Larger size not available in this style. Ordered different but similar style one size larger fits perfect. Have other pairs of this brand in a slip on and all run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Bunken

customer_reviews.title: Do all Americans now have fat feet
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes however they are made for only people with extra wide feet. That's so sad because Sketcher did make a good quality shoe before China Started making them. I have a narrow foot and now all you can buy are wide or extra wide. Had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: LAH

customer_reviews.title: Nice padding in wide width.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe because i have an extra wide foot with high arches. This shoe gets the job done with lots of padding that is relief to sore aching feet. It gives lots of support around the ankle with a nice amount of padding. I have a measurement of 4 2/16 across the ball of my foot. If this measure meant is 4 to 4 1/16 you can get away with the wide version of this shoe. But if pure pushing 4 3/16 across the ball of your foot go for the extra wide version its well worth the extra room. I will be ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, great comfort and priced right.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my man and he gets a lot of compliments. He has diabetes and neuropathy with extreme foot pain. He also has a very wide foot. This is the most comfortable pair of shoes he ever owned! Great color, too! I own a lot of Sketchers and all of them are so comfortable. Priced right too.
customer_reviews.author: Black Sheep

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe, BUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoe but reading the reviews they said that they ran a little small. I wear a 9.5 so i bought a 10. Come to find out they are the same fit as Nike, but they feel and wear alot better. It was easy to send back and get the right size. So it was my fault not just getting the size that I know that I wear. They made it very easy processing the return and getting the right size.
customer_reviews.author: C&M Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long at all!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had several pairs of these. The latest pair was purchased 7/19/2019. And this morning the are already falling part. He has a desk job and they get very little wear and tear. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for flat feet - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY flat feet and these shoes are actually perfect for me. The arch is very low so if you need a lot of arch support look elsewhere - but for flat feet these shoes are extremely comfortable. I wear these shoes nearly every day and my feet never hurt unless it's a day I'm really on them a lot more than usual. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PghDrake

customer_reviews.title: Best buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this 3x's for my husband and my son, my husband still wears the 1st pair I bought 4 years ago!!! They are durable and fit perfect and offer really great support whisch helped both of them with the back pain they use to complain about daily now I don't hear them complain at all!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: glue is visible with lots of cosmetic defects.
customer_reviews.text: It's bad when you get Knock off Sketchers. Really bad. They are already cheap shoes. I've never purchased shoes before where you can clearly see glue holding them together. And there are a ton of cosmetic defects all over both shoes. Bad stitching, black spots all over randomly. Almost like some kind of adhesive. I haven't even tried them on. Been so disappointed with Amazon lately. No integrity anymore.
customer_reviews.author: chris holl

customer_reviews.title: NOT MEMORY FOAM!
customer_reviews.text: It said its memory foam in the photos! I specifically bought these because of that. I am ticked off. I have flat feet and that feature changed my life in that I could stay on my feet the whole day and carry heavy items with no fatigue. Now I have to waste my time and return them at Kohls.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Bad construction uncomfortable interior
customer_reviews.text: It was time for new shoes and I always had good luck with Skechers. Not this time. The package arrived in good condition and the shoes looked absolutely excellent. However after trying them on I noticed that there was a bulge on the interior. Both shoes had the same defective construction overlapping material not stitched into place. This made wearing them very uncomfortable on the outer side of both my feet. This purchase was a complete disappointment and I returned them the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers hold up VERY well for my kids. They used to blow through shoes in 3 months. I bought my son a pair of sketchers and they lasted a year. I bought these for him this chrismtas and they fit great. They’re comfortable for him and they look really nice. They’re not cheap foam soles.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Will be unsure buying another pair.
customer_reviews.text: Use these for working out. At 71 I like to be comfortable and these are just that AND they are underpriced but don't tell any one because they might increase the price. After a few weeks I have noticed the left shoe feels like the sole, insole or shoe is failing. It does not have replaceable insoles.
customer_reviews.author: John Dunten

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe for my difficult husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! He is very hard on shoes, he's in construction, so finding shoes that will kat longer than a couple weeks is not easy. So to find some that will last months AND is comfortable is AMAZING! Also, he has super wide feet so yet another difficult thing to find. The only thing I personally would change is the look, but he could care less about how they look.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherA

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Fit Off
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers have been my preferred brand but I have found fit varies depending on style. You would think the fit would be constant but I can wear anywhere from a 10 to 11 in similar styles. Makes it difficult to buy online Had to return these
customer_reviews.author: zakosdad

customer_reviews.title: Treat package with more care!!! Plastic bag!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes was nice, but due to the shipping it was left outside in the rain. Box and shoes totally soaked. Shoes were stain from ink on boxes! Shame!!! And clearly on our house is a sign to put package on bench, under cover!!?!
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bought less then a month ago, already coming apart!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these less then a month ago for my husband for Father’s Day. Have to say I’m highly disappointed!! The toe part on both shoes have many strands coming undone. My husband has over a inch of space between his toe and the shoe so it isn’t because the shoes are to small. Poor quality, would not buy again or recommend any one else wasting their money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality and excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: In a world where sport shoes often sell for over $150 these shoes are an awesome bargain with excellent quality! My second pair is identical to my first pair that I bought and took two years to wear out.... these are a great bargain and feel fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not x-wide.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9 x wide and it feels like a regular non-wide shoe. I usually wear a 9 men’s and sometimes have to get the wide. I knew I should get the wide anyways and then saw x-wide so I got that. It’s extremely uncomfortable and I have to take it off during the day because my feet hurt which is hard at work. I would like to return it but not sure I can with wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers for running, workouts and day to day wear... Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These were the first pair of shoes I bought more than 5 years ago that I found really comfortable. Bought another design from Skechers that lasted about 3 years, and now I wanted to buy nothing else but these again. I generally purchase my shoes in-store after trying them on, to make sure they fit and are comfortable and the design is what I expect. But I made an exception for these, ordered them online after determining my size and have loved them!
customer_reviews.author: CK

product_meta.title: Skechers Mens 50988 50988 Grey Size: 7.5 UK
product_meta.description: Enjoy classic, sporty styling and exceptional comfort in this casual sneaker from Skechers.
